content: Patient #489227 received radiation therapy at Rockwood Medical Complex on 02/28/2024, with follow-up integrative sessions approved through prior authorization GVH-PA-489227-OC2. Treatment plan includes weekly acupuncture targeting chemotherapy-induced peripheral neuropathy. Demographic data shows patient is 42-year-old commercial policyholder residing at 1845 Evergreen Terrace, Apt 3B.
